title: Spicy sweet potato rosti
ingredients: ['450g sweet potatoes, peeled and grated', '60g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '1 teaspoon brown sugar', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '2 eggs, beaten', '120ml milk', 'About 100ml vegetable oil for frying, or as needed']
